metadata.title: CVE-2023-5851 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Downloads in Google Chrome prior to119.0.6045.105 allowed a remote attacker to obfuscate security UI via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
